sentence.Network_en: The room is terribly drafty with the window open.
sentence.Network_cn: 窗户开着,房间里的穿堂风大得吓人.

sentence.Network_en: Drafty a standard that is quality of evaluation living space.
sentence.Network_cn: 通风良好是评价居住空间质量的一个标准.

sentence.Network_en: Their damp drafty house was scarcely habitable.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们潮湿透风的屋子不宜住人.
